attributes.action: Award David Young a  George Cross
attributes.additional_details: He is a hero, brave and great example of human being.
attributes.background:
For more info see 
Dave Young’s work in Ukraine the subject of Another Man’s War, the 25-minute Times film released today which charts the volunteer rescuer’s work during the ongoing battle for Bakhmut.

Should be recognised with a George Cross

rejection.details: You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour at http://www.gov.uk/honours
